text: Ahard disk with a transfer rate of 100 x 10Â¢ bps is constantly transferring data to memory using DMA. The processor runs at 1 MHz, and takes 500 and 1000 clock cycles to initiate and complete DMA transfer respectively. If the size of the transfer is 10000 bytes, what is the percentage of time processor is blocked during the transfer operation? (Rounded off to two decimal places)
